output.sentences: This weekend, we stayed at a beautiful bed in breakfast that I wish was mine to own.
This trip was to in the countryside.
There was so much history at this location, even the barn was historical.
The house was close enough to access the city, but far enough to feel secluded
The location was scenic, views were wonderful, and i'm so happy we stayed.
